Package com.example.service

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.example.service.ReservationService
public class ReservationService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing reservations of workplaces and conferences.

    • bookWorkplace

      public boolean bookWorkplace(Workplace workplace, Date startTime, Date endTime, User user)
      Books a workplace for a specific time slot with a user.
      Parameters:
      workplace - The workplace to book.
      startTime - The start time of the booking.
      endTime - The end time of the booking.
      user - The user booking the workplace.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful, false otherwise.

    • bookConference

      public boolean bookConference(Conference conference, Date startTime, Date endTime, String username)
      Books a conference room for a specific time slot with a username.
      Parameters:
      conference - The conference to book.
      startTime - The start time of the booking.
      endTime - The end time of the booking.
      username - The username reserving the conference.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful, false otherwise.
